metadata.title: CVE-2019-10878 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Teeworlds 0.7.2, there is a failed bounds check in CDataFileReader::GetData() and CDataFileReader::ReplaceData() and related functions in engine/shared/datafile.cpp that can lead to an arbitrary free and out-of-bounds pointer write, possibly resulting in remote code execution.

criterions.comment: teeworlds package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7.2-5').
